function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spatial correlation of infectious disease transmission due to people's living and work locations","Impact":"Increased spread of infectious diseases across regions","Mitigation":"Implementing strict travel restrictions and spatial distancing measures","Technologies":"GIS mapping and spatial analysis software","People":"Residents, workers, commuters","Owner":"Local governments, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Infection spread from adjacent space to surrounding regions","Impact":"Rapid spread of infectious diseases to nearby areas","Mitigation":"Enforcing containment measures and rapid response protocols","Technologies":"Geospatial tracking and monitoring systems","People":"Residents, neighboring communities","Owner":"Emergency response teams, local health departments"},{"Description":"Transmission patterns leading to time series change in the number of newly infected people","Impact":"Unpredictable and fluctuating infection rates","Mitigation":"Monitoring and analyzing spatial transmission patterns to predict outbreaks","Technologies":"Big data analytics and predictive modeling tools","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Health and research institutions"}]}
